name: Triangular Bandaging
description: Using triangular bandages for slings and wounds
warning: For moderate wounds and arm injuries. Call 911 for severe bleeding.
emergency_notes: Triangular bandages are versatile for slings and head wounds
Can be folded into different widths

steps.title: Prepare Triangular Bandage
detailed_instructions: Use commercial triangular bandage if available
steps.voice_prompt: Prepare a triangular bandage by unfolding it or folding a square cloth diagonally.

steps.title: Position for Arm Sling
steps.voice_prompt: Bend the injured arm at a ninety-degree angle across the chest.

steps.title: Apply Triangular Bandage
steps.voice_prompt: Slide the bandage under the arm with the point toward the elbow. Bring the ends up and tie at the side of the neck.

steps.title: Secure the Elbow
steps.description: Pin or tie the point at elbow
detailed_instructions: Fold point of triangle at elbow
Secure with safety pin or twist and tuck
steps.voice_prompt: Secure the point of the bandage at the elbow with a pin or by tucking it in.

steps.title: Check and Adjust
steps.voice_prompt: Check fingertips for good circulation. Adjust if needed and seek medical attention.
